title: EXPERIENCE
description: Director's Assistant, Executive Assistant, Production Coordinator
paragraphe: With a diverse background spanning roles such as Director's Assistant, Executive Assistant, and Production Coordinator, I bring a wealth of experience and expertise to the table. From liaising between directors and production teams to managing budgets and facilitating smooth operations, I've honed my skills in every aspect of the entertainment industry.

experienceHistory.description: **Executive Assistant / Social Media Manager** - Rachel Krupa
